SummaryEnglish: Big wave surfer Everaldo Pato lives in search of new surfing technologies, and becomes the protagonist of a new sport.

1.SummaryEnglish: Pato leaves for the Czech Rep. To visit the Jetsurf factory, a motorized board. From there they go to Croatia to do a series of tests and adjustments on the board, to use it to surf giant waves in the future.

2.SummaryEnglish: Pato goes to Hawaii to test the jetsurf. There he meets friends from the Czech Republic and his friend Kai Lenny. Together, they surf the waves on the North Shore of Oahu with their motorized surfboards.

6.SummaryEnglish: For the first time, Pato participates in a jetsurf event, the first stage of the world championship that takes place on Maracaipe beach in Recife.

7.SummaryEnglish: Pato returns to the landmark place in his career as a professional surfer, where it all started. He goes in search of a big swell in the powerful waves of El Bouy, tow in and is surprised by the perfection.

8.SummaryEnglish: Pato returns to Jet Surf's headquarters to help develop a new board model. They leave on a 10 hour trip to Switzerland where there is a super action event: jet surf, motocross and jet ski.

9.SummaryEnglish: After a marathon of Jet surf events, Pato discovers places he never thought he would ever visit. Find stunning beauty in Eastern Europe and learn a lot about this new sport.

10.SummaryEnglish: Pato goes to Eastern Europe, to participate in a series of events and tests with jet surf.

11.SummaryEnglish: From the Czech Republic to Hawaii, from Recife to Portugal, the big wave surfer Everaldo Pato lives in search of new surfing technologies, and becomes the protagonist of a new sport, Jetsurf.

12.SummaryEnglish: The athlete performs a personal challenge and faces a 233km SUP stroke across the Chilean desert coast. Taking food, water and your travel equipment, prepared for any and all surprises on the high seas.

13.SummaryEnglish: Pato returns to his home after an intense year of travel and reveals that his "home" is also a great place to train and be in the middle of water sports.

1.SummaryEnglish: Everaldo Pato, a big wave surfer, accompanied by his daughter Belinha and his wife and cameraman, Fabiana Nigol travel to test their new motor board on the best waves around the world.

2.SummaryEnglish: Pato goes to Arica in Chile to surf his favorite waves. However, when he gets home, he finds that his jet skis have a serious problem with the turbine.

3.SummaryEnglish: Pato monitors a swell that must reach the California coast and then descend to the north of Peru. With that, he prepares his boards and heads for Mavericks to surf big waves.

4.SummaryEnglish: After catching a giant swell in California, Pato manages to arrive in Peru in time to surf perfect, tubular waves on a secret peak at the beach with his friend and local Jhonathan.

5.SummaryEnglish: Cine Conhecimento 2013 brings classics by the Italian brothers Taviani and the German Fassbinder, in addition to national and contemporary European titles. Presenter Lorena Calábria highlights historical, cultural and behavioral details of the films.

6.SummaryEnglish: Pato travels to Oregon with his friend Felipe Cesarano in search of a secret slab peak that he had surfed years ago with Ed Guzman.

9.SummaryEnglish: Everaldo Pato travels from Hawaii to Florianópolis to learn his newest challenge: surfing with Foilboard. After surfing the lagoon and the sea, he guarantees that this is his newest passion.

10.SummaryEnglish: Everaldo Pato leaves Rio de Janeiro for Arica in Chile, in search of the best wave conditions for surfing with his newest passion: Foil Board.
